DOC.brief_summary: This study examine effect meal frequency meal composition risk factor cardiometabolic disease .
DOC.brief_title: Combined Effects Meal Frequency Protein Load Cardiometabolic Risk Factors
DOC.detailed_description: Cardio-Metabolic Disease ( CMD ) lead cause death globally & Singapore . Large scale epidemiological evidence confirm elevated postprandial Glucose , Insulin , Triglycerides major risk factor CMD . Recent evidence suggest benefit high protein diet health effect eat small meal remain enigmatic . The aim study examine Meal frequency ( 2-large v 6-smaller isocaloric meal ) , High Low Protein load acute postprandial health biomarkers . The investigator hypothesize Higher Protein & Higher Meal Frequency would beneficial cardiometabolic health .
DOC.criteria: Chinese Males Age : 21 50 year . Body mass stable within last 2 month selfreport . Body mass index ( BMI ) : < 30kg/m2 . Normal fast blood glucose level≤ 6.0 mmol/L Blood pressure ≤ 140/90 mmHg Not participate dietary intervention past 2months . Special dietary practice ( e.g . Vegetarians , Atkins diet ) diet due religious reason study period ( e.g . Fasting Ramadan ) Smoking . Excessive alcohol consumption : consuming alcohol > 4 day per week ≥5 alcoholic drink ( male ) ≥4 alcoholic drink ( female ) per time ( National Health Survey , 2010 ) . Metabolic Diseases ( include thyroid dysfunction ) Using Medication affect carbohydrate fat metabolism Allergy component provide meal ( gluten , nut , milk , dairy )
